recordingmedia: Internal Memory: Approx. 8MB SD/SDHC Card (Up to 32GB Support) [MMC Card not supported]
exposuremeteringmethod: Artificial Intelligence AE (AiAE), Center-Weighted Average, Spot (Fixed to Center of Frame), Face AE
movie: Movie Format: MOV (Motion JPEG), Audio: G.711 [Monaural]
shootingrange: (Wide) Approx. 0.5 m a?" 4.7 m (ISO800); (Tele) Approx. 1.0 m a?" 2.6 m (ISO800)
playbackmodes: Single Photo, Index (9/16 Thumbnails) Slide Show, Zoom (Approx. x2 a?" x8)
dimensionswxhxd: Approx. 4.26 x 2.35 x 1.22 in. / 108.2 x 59.7 x 30.9 mm (Based on CIPA Standards)
power: Rechargeable Li-ion Battery LB-050, 3.7V 900mAh, In-Camera Charging
whitebalancecontrol: Auto (AWB), Daylight, Cloudy, Flourescent, Flourescent CWF, Incandescent, Manual
otherfeatures: Eye-Fi, PictBridge, ExifPrint Support, Multi-Language Support (27 Languages)
shootingmodes: M, Auto, Portrait, Movie, Panorama, Scene (ASCN, Landscape, Sport, Beach, Sunset, Fireworks, Night Landscape, Sketch, Snow, Children, ID, Glass, Photo Frame, Panning Shot, Fish Eye, Party, Indoor, Leaf, Museum, Night Portrait)
flashmodes: Auto, Red-Eye Reduction, Forced Flash, No Flash, Slow Synchro, Red-Eye Reduction + Slow Synchro
